name: miracle-hides-keys-es6
description: ES6 client for miracle hides keys

scripts.prebuild: npx rimraf build && npx mkdirp build && mkdirp build/non-tsc && npx rimraf license-report && mkdirp license-report
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:html && npm run build:images && npm run build:tsc && npm run build:browserify && npm run build:uglyfy:client.min.js && npm run build:uglyfy:client.js
scripts.license-report: npx rimraf license-report && mkdirp license-report && npx license-report --output=json > license-report/license-report.json
scripts.predist: npx rimraf dist && npx mkdirp dist
scripts.dist: npm run dist:build && npm run dist:copy
scripts.dist:copy: npx copyfiles -u 2 build/non-tsc/**/* dist && npx copyfiles -u 1 build/client.min.js dist/
scripts.git: npm run lint && git add . && git status

author: Michael Diers
